mapper.select: select c.*, u.username as author_name, cm.company_name from news_content c, news_user u, news_company cm where c.author_id = u.id and cm.id = c.company_id and c.news_type = #{newsType} order by c.sendtime desc, c.id desc limit 0, 10

select t.* from ((select c.*, u.username as author_name, cm.company_name from news_content c, news_user u, news_company cm where c.author_id = u.id and cm.id = c.company_id and c.news_type = #{newsType} and c.sendtime = (select nc.sendtime from news_content nc where nc.id = #{newsId}) and c.id < #{newsId} order by c.sendtime desc, c.id desc) union all (select c.*, u.username as author_name, cm.company_name from news_content c, news_user u, news_company cm where c.author_id = u.id and cm.id = c.company_id and c.news_type = #{newsType} and c.sendtime < (select nc.sendtime from news_content nc where nc.id = #{newsId}) order by c.sendtime desc, c.id desc)) t order by t.sendtime desc, t.id desc limit 0, 10

select c.*, u.username as author_name, cm.company_name from news_content c, news_user u, news_company cm where c.author_id = u.id and cm.id = c.company_id and c.news_type = 0 and c.company_id = #{companyId} order by c.sendtime desc, c.id desc limit 0, 5

select c.*, u.username as author_name, cm.company_name from news_content c, news_user u, news_company cm where c.author_id = u.id and cm.id = c.company_id and c.news_type = 1 and c.company_id = #{companyId} order by c.sendtime desc, c.id desc limit 0, 5
